errors.gameNotFound: We couldn't find the game you are looking for.

divider.title: How good do you know popular songs?
divider.text: Challenge your friends/colleagues/whatever in a competative song guessing game

choosePlaylist.title: Choose a Playlist
choosePlaylist.text: You select a playlist that you want to play so you don't have to worry about songs that nobody knows.

playInGroup.title: Play in a Group
playInGroup.text: By sharing the link with your buddies you can start a comepetative song-guessing-match.

enjoySpotify.title: Enjoy spotify features
enjoySpotify.text: This whole beast is backed by the spotify API. Therfore you can access all those fance spotify features.

whySignIn.title: But why do I have to sign in?
whySignIn.text: In order to access functions of spotify, the person creating a game has to sign in with their spotify account. We do nothing else than requesting spotifies data with your account. If you do not trust us, you can have a look at the
